mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE notice_type = #{noticeType} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE status = #{status} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE priority = #{priority} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE status = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE status = 1 AND deleted = 0 AND publish_time <= #{currentDate} AND (expire_time IS NULL OR expire_time >= #{currentDate}) ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cemetery_notice WHERE priority IN (1, 2) AND status = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY priority DESC, publish_time DESC
